chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI k :: IRO k :: ir)) -> forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) ir

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
get_op_output_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I _ => None | O k => Some k end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_output_keys _%list_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
before : ?A -> ?A -> list ?A -> Prop where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
NoDup : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
get_op_input_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I k => Some k | O _ => None end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_input_keys _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
in_before_before_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys)) -> (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI k :: IRU k :: ir)) -> forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ ys) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ ys) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) ir
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
O_IRO_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In (IRO k) ir
NoDup_get_op_input_keys_In_2_3 : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> False
NoDup_get_op_output_keys_In_2_3 : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> False
IRO_O_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRU_I_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
no_Ik_in_first2 : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> forall k' : K, In (I k') (xs ++ ys) -> k <> k'
O_IRO_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> In (IRO k) ir
IRO_O_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys)
NoDup_get_op_input_keys_In_I : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys)) -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys) -> False
IRU_I_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys)
op_equivalent_all_Is_O_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') xs -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (xs ++ O k :: ys) (O k :: xs ++ ys)
NoDup_get_op_output_keys_In_O : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ O k :: ys)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> False
op_equivalent_all_Is_I_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x xs -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (xs ++ I k :: ys) (I k :: xs ++ ys)
before_2_3_insert : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a b : A), before a b (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> b <> x -> b <> y -> before a b (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
before_2_3_reduce : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a b : A), before a b (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs) -> a <> x -> a <> y -> before a b (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
NoDup_app3_not_in_2 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (b : A), NoDup (xs ++ ys ++ b :: zs) -> In b ys -> False
NoDup_app3_not_in_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (b : A), NoDup (xs ++ ys ++ b :: zs) -> In b zs -> False
before_middle_reduce : forall (A : Type) (xs zs : list A) (a b y : A), before a b (xs ++ y :: zs) -> a <> y -> before a b (xs ++ zs)
IR_equiv_AAOF_II_neq : forall (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR) (k k' : K), k <> k' -> op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: I k' :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k' :: I k :: ys) target)
NoDup_app3_not_in_1 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (b : A), NoDup (xs ++ ys ++ b :: zs) -> In b xs -> False
In_cons_2_3_neq : forall (A : Type) (a x y : A) (xs ys zs : list A), In a (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs) -> a <> x -> a <> y -> In a (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
In_cons_2_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y a : A), In a (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In a (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
before_middle_insert : forall (A : Type) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A) (a b : A), before a b (xs ++ zs) -> b <> y -> before a b (xs ++ y :: zs)
IR_equiv_AAOF_I : forall (k : K) (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR), op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: ys) target)
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
good_trace_ind : forall P : list IR -> Prop -> Prop, P [] True -> (forall k : K, P [IRI k] False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRI k :: IRI k' :: ir) False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P ir (good_trace ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRO k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace ir)) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P ir (good_trace ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRU k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace ir)) -> (forall (k : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRO k :: ir) False) -> (forall (k : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRU k :: ir) False) -> forall ir : list IR, P ir (good_trace ir)
subseq_app_head : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A), subseq ys zs -> subseq (xs ++ ys) (xs ++ zs)
subseq_2_3 : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A) (x y : A), subseq (xs ++ ys ++ zs) (xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs)
op_equivalent_all_Is_I : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x l -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (l ++ [I k]) (I k :: l)
op_equivalent_all_Is_O : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') l -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (l ++ [O k]) (O k :: l)
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
in_middle_reduce : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A), In a (xs ++ y :: zs) -> a <> y -> In a (xs ++ zs)
In_app_before : forall (A : Type) (xs ys : list A) (x y : A), In x xs -> ~ In y xs -> before x y (xs ++ y :: ys)
AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
before_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x y : A), before x y l -> x <> y -> In x l -> In y l -> exists xs ys zs : list A, l = xs ++ x :: ys ++ y :: zs
in_middle_insert : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A), In a (xs ++ zs) -> In a (xs ++ y :: zs)
